meanings.definition: Not involving or characterized by sin.
meanings.sent1: The unsinful act of helping others is always commendable.
meanings.sent2: She lived an unsinful life, always doing good deeds.
meanings.sent3: It was an unsinful mistake to accidentally drop the cake on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The unsinful garden bloomed with flowers of pure beauty.
meanings.sent5: The unsinful sky painted a serene backdrop for the peaceful village.

meanings.sent1: The unsinful child played innocently in the park.
meanings.sent2: After confessing, she felt unsinful and relieved.
meanings.sent3: The unsinful puppy wagged its tail happily, unaware of any wrongdoing.
meanings.sent4: Her unsinful laughter echoed through the room, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The unsinful stream flowed gently, cleansing all who dipped their hands in its waters.
